header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: neighbours moving house, menopause, age, driving, Christmas and New Year, skiing, broken watch
header.activity: Friends talking about friends’ lives and our own lives.

speaker.fls: French -- working knowledge; German -- Working knowledge
